div.note: lukarnastaþin : Uppström emends in note to lukarnastaþan
liu-teiþ : Uppström emends in note to liuh-teiþ
aibr : Grimm conjectures tibr
usstagg : Gabelentz-Loebe, Massmann, Bernhardt and Uppström in note emend to usstigg
ƕa-ƕazuh : Uppström, Streitberg and Snædal emend to ƕazuh (dittography)
·2 : Uppström sees a colon
fulhsja : Uppström, Streitberg, and Snædal emend to fulhsnja
sijaiþ : only Uppström sees swa following
fulhls(n)-ja : Uppström, Streitberg, and Snædal emend to fulhs(n)-ja
faihuþra[†] : Uppström and Streitberg conjecture faihuþra[ina]
-jaina : Uppström, Streitberg and Snædal conjecture [tau]-jaina
wigis : Uppström, Streitberg and Snædal emend to wigs
unsib-jana : Streitberg, Wrede and Snædal emend to unsib-jona, Gabelentz-Loebe and Bernhardt in unsib-ja sa
filhan : Streitberg conjectures gafilhan
þanuh atberun : Uppström emends in note to þan usatberun
atgagggand : Streitberg and XXX emend to atgaggand
fa[†]njana : material lacuna, Uppström, Streitberg and XXX conjecture fa[ir]njana
skaut[†] : material lacuna, Uppström, Streitberg and XXX conjecture skaut[a]
praufetis : Streitberg emends to praufetaus
meinna : Uppström, Streitberg, and Snædal emend to meinana (although an addition of a between the two characters of nn at text height is possible)
andhaf- : material lacuna of the following folio, Streitberg and Uppström (and Snædal?) conjecture andhaf-jands
silubra(m) : Streitberg, Schroder and Snædal emend to silubreinam
kaurbaunaun : Streitberg, Kauffmann and Snædal emend to kaurbaunan
andwair-þi : Uppström, Streitberg and Snædal emend to andawair-þi
a[†]a : material lacuna, Uppström, Streitberg and Snædal conjecture a[n]a
ƕarjanoh : Uppström, Streitberg and Snædal emend to ƕarjoh
[†]eila[†] : material lacuna, Uppström, Streitberg and Snædal conjecture [ƕ]eila[i]
diskrit-noda : Uppström emends in note to disskrit-noda
managai[†] : material lacuna, Uppström, Streitberg, and Snædal conjecture managai[m]
iosez : Streitberg, Massmann, Bernhardt and Snædal emend to iosezis
þridjin : Uppström, Streitberg, and Snædal emend to þridjan
